_rawChildren.text: You need a gift idea for Gifts For Movie Lovers - here they are ... Be sure that your gift will receive high marks, even from the most ardent film critic! Just see how unique the ideas on this list are!

children.text: You need a gift idea for Gifts For Movie Lovers - here they are ... Be sure that your gift will receive high marks, even from the most ardent film critic! Just see how unique the ideas on this list are!

Who said this gift would only be for a movie lover? This quiz game is also ideal for any board game lover. Unique 2 in 1 gift! And you will see how many movies you know. The game is suitable for 8+ so you can have fun all together!

This bowl is a great personalized gift for any movie buff. Add the name of the person you are taking it for or your favourite movie and fill it with all sorts of goodies. Admit it - you don't just eat popcorn at movie nights. That's why you can put all kinds of chips and snacks inside.

node.Name: Top Films of All Time Bucket List

children.text: This Bucket List with 100 movies for all time is an absolute must for any movie buff! Quite seriously. Each of these 100 films has a well-deserved place on the list. Besides - canceling the movies you've already watched is so satisfying ...

You don't even have to be a movie lover to enjoy this cute typewriter! So original ... perfect for all the upcoming movie nights. But in addition to yourself, you can combine it in an even more spectacular gift - with packets of popcorn and 2-3 favorite movies on DVD. Or with a bonus -
(see below in the list). And hopefully, he invites you to a movie night.

3,2,1… Action! Prepare to hear these words of honor after you give away this Film Director Cap. A truly unique gift.And in combination with a clapperboard and a director's chair (see below) you will have an amazing and long time memorable gift!

node.Name: Eat What You Watch: A Cookbook for Movie Lovers

children.text: This book is a religion. Every movie lover will appreciate the recipes from their favorite movies. Like the apple strudel from Inglorious Basterds or Remy's signed ratatouille at Ratatouille.
In this book, you will find more than 40 recipes that recreate dishes of classic and cult films that surely everyone has watched. An ideal gift for every movie buff!
A gift like this Retro VHS Lamp is super original! It's also perfect for the most avid movie lovers out there! Choose the VHS of his favorite movie and you're ready ...

This Director's Chair and the Director's Hat just above are a guarantee that everyone will be delighted with your gift! The combination of the two is more than a great idea. Moreover, this chair is strong, stylish, and super comfortable.

The Mini Video Projector will be used endlessly. We promise you that if you are a movie buff you will always take it with you - on vacation, at sea, on a walk, in the mountains ... everywhere. And .. they will be close to their passion everywhere. Believe us, this gift will appeal even if you are not a movie buff. The projector has a clear image and great contrast. And thanks to the built-in speakers, there is impeccable sound! The perfect movie gift.
